name: THE SHARKS
description:
SURVIVAL HAS NEVER BEEN SO HARD! IN THIS NEW GAME,
 WE ARE TALKING ABOUT OUR CHARACTER WHO FALLS A CHARACTER
 AS A RESULT OF AIRCRAFT ACCIDENTS. THIS 2D PIXEL ACTION 
GAME IS ONE OF OUR BEST GAMES. DON'T FORGET TO COMMENT AND 
ASSESS THE GAME!! YOU CAN ALSO DONATE TO OUR GAME IF YOU WANT!  
DİRİCANGAMES TEAM PROUDLY PRESENTS..
